thread.title: Avalanche D Barrie suspended 3 games by NHL
thread.title_full: Avalanche D Barrie suspended 3 games by NHL

title: Avalanche D Barrie suspended 3 games by NHL
text:
Avalanche D Barrie suspended 3 games by NHL for charging, interference on Ducks' Despres THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   18, 2015 - 12:08 amLast Updated: October 18, 2015 - 12:09 am   
People: 
Men's sports (2326) 

NEW YORK â€” Colorado defenseman Tyson Barrie was suspended three games without pay by the NHL on Saturday night for charging and interference on Anaheim's Simon Despres the previous night. 
Barrie was punished for a check on Despres when he jumped and used his shoulder to hit the Ducks' defenseman in the head with 8 1/2 minutes remaining in the second period of the Avalanche's 3-0 win Friday night.
